DOC.brief_title: Factors Obstructive Granulation Tissue Formation After Ultraflex Stenting Benign Tracheal Narrowing
DOC.detailed_description: From August 2001 September 2007 , patient benign tracheal stenosis underwent endoscopic tracheal stent placement Chang Gung Memorial Hospital , university-affiliated hospital Northern Taiwan , evaluate . Definition airway condition Dynamic collapse ( tracheao-malacia ) define tracheal lumen narrow expiration bronchoscopic examination . Structural tracheal stenosis define tracheal stenosis exclude dynamic collapse . Etiologies structural tracheal stenosis post-intubation tracheostomy , post-tuberculosis infection , granulation tissue formation cause previous SEMS re-stenosis , previous SEMS fracture , corrosive injury stricture , mediastinitis cause airway stricture , goiter compression . Obstructive granulation tissue formation SEMS implantation define granulation tissue obstruct lumen SEMS bronchoscopic examination , include proximal distal end . Significant variable , structural obstruction airway SEMS implantation enter forward logistical regression analysis determine net effect predictor control net effect others obstructive granulation tissue formation . Obstructive granulation tissue formation curve patient without structural tracheal stenosis SEMS implantation compare log rank test .
